Classes in org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.loadbalancer.policies.errorchecking used by org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.loadbalancer.policies.errorchecking
ErrorCheckingException
          An ErrorCheckingException is thrown when an ErrorCheckingPolicy policy cannot be applied in the getBackends() method.
ErrorCheckingPolicy
          Defines the policy to adopt for error checking.
